attributes.additional_details: I write to ask you to make remembrance day a national bank holiday. Thousands lost their lives in the call of duty to give us the life we live today. I feel write owe all the men that made the ultimate sacrifice the biggest gratitude. Please don't ignore this. The country would have been completely different if they hadn't fought for us. We owe thou to their memory. Lest we never forget. Thankyou xx
